name: Luthiea

skills.name: Burning Arrow
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 30% chance of placing a 5% [Poison] debuff for 2 turns.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +5%
Lvl. 4 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Lvl. 5 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Lvl. 6 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%

skills.name: Ice Shot
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 3 times at random. Each hit has a 25% chance of placing a [Freeze] debuff for 1 turn.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +10%
Lvl. 4 Damage +10%
Lvl. 5 Cooldown -1

skills.name: Numbing Poison
skills.raw_description:
Attacks all enemies. Has a 75% chance of placing a 30% [Decrease SPD] debuff for 2 turns.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +10%
Lvl. 4 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Lvl. 5 Buff/Debuff Chance +15%
Lvl. 6 Cooldown -1
